channel.title: Devops on Scalereal
channel.description: Recent content in Devops on Scalereal

item.title: What's this docker thing?
item.description: Building tools for mass innovation Docker is a set of platform as a service products that use OS-level virtualization to deliver software in packages called containers. Containers are isolated from one another and bundle their own software, libraries and configuration files; they can communicate with each other through well-defined channels.

item.title: What's this Kubernetes thing?
item.description: Building tools for mass innovation Kubernetes is an open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management. It was originally designed by Google, and is now maintained by the Cloud Native Computing Foundation
